name: 2nd International conference on Bioinformatics and computational studies
content: 2nd International conference on Bioinformatics and computational studies (ICBCS 2024) April 13-14, 2024, Virtual Conference https://icbcs2024.org/index Scope; The key goal of 2nd International conference on Bioinformatics and computational studies (ICBCS 2024) is to arrange opportunity for the participants to share their knowledge, innovations, recent advances in Bioinformatics, new ideas and experience in person to join from different parts on the world. Bioinformatics has become an important part of life sciences research by empowering new computational approaches. Computational studies and Bioinformatics is an interdisciplinary field that progresses and applies computational methods to explore biological data collections such as protein samples, cell populations and genetic sequences for newer predictions or find out new Biology. We hope ICBCS outcome will lead to substantial contributions to the knowledge base which is up-to-date in scientific fields. Topics Of Interest • Bioimage informatics • Bioinformatics • Biostatistics • Biotechnology • Cloud computing • Computational Biology • Computer aided drug designing and docking • Computer programming • DNA sequencing • Drug development • Gene expression • Gene Therapy • Genetic and population assay • Genetic Engineering • Genetics and Genomics • Genome analysis • Genome Biology and Evolution • Human molecular genetics • Mapping of genomes • Metagenomics • Molecular Biology and Evolution • Molecular Biology • Molecular docking • Nucleic acids and DNA research • Protein Engineering, Design and selection • Proteomics • Sequence analysis • Statistics and Engineering • Structural Bioinformatics • Systems Biology Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by April 06, 2024 (Last call). Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal on Bioinformatics and Biosciences (IJBB) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from ICBCS 2024, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journals • International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) • International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) • Advanced Medical Sciences: An International Journal (AMS) • Health Informatics - An International Journal (HIIJ) • Bioscience & Engineering: An International Journal (BIOEJ) • Advanced Energy: An International Journal (AEIJ) Important Dates: Third Batch ; Submission After March 04, 2024 • Submission Deadline : April 06, 2024 (Last call) • Authors Notification : April 10, 2024 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due: April 12, 2024 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : icbcs@icbcs2024.org or icbcsconf@yahoo.com Submission System : https://icbcs2024.org/submission/index.php For More Details Please Visit : https://icbcs2024.org/index
